name: IN TIME YOU WILL BE MINE
name_original: IN TIME YOU WILL BE MINE
description:
TW: character with a history of CSA

a narrative poem game from lin xue's perspective and how he feels about sengreen and their relationship that's somewhere between emperor/knight, regrettably attracted rivals, and hatefucking. 

if you end up liking them, you can play their first volume in LIAR, LIONESS
